segments.text: My dear , it's five flights up !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right.We ' ll get used to it.Besides , it is quiet up there.We ' re little further away from the street and traffic noise and there's no one living over us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's pretty bright in there and big enough for our children to play .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The stove and refrigerator are in good working order , and I don't see any loose electric wiring that could cause fires .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The plumbing seems OK , too.The toilet flushes and the shower has hot and cold water , and the sinks don't seem to leak .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The place is OK.Let ' s go there and have a look at it again .
segments.speaker: S1
